verses.verse: <S%G3753>When<s%> they drew <S%G1448>near<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G967>Bethsphage<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives,<s%> he <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "Go your <S%G5217>way<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> that is <S%G2713>opposite<s%> <S%G5216>you.<s%> Immediately <S%G2112>as<s%> you <S%G1531>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> you will <S%G2147>find<s%> a young <S%G4454>donkey<s%> <S%G1909>tied,<s%> on <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>one<s%> has <S%G2523>sat.<s%> <S%G3089>Untie<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and bring <S%G71>him.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2036>asks<s%> <S%G4160>you,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Why are <S%G5213>you<s%> doing <S%G5124>this?<s%>' <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G3754><s%> 'The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532>needs<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%>' <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> he will <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> back <S%G5602>here.<s%>"

<S%G1161>They<s%> went <S%G565>away,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> a young <S%G4454>donkey<s%> <S%G1210>tied<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G1854>outside<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the open <S%G296>street,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3089>untied<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G5100>Some<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3004>asked<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> are <S%G4160>you<s%> <S%G3089>doing,<s%> untying the young <S%G4454>donkey?<s%>"
<S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> just <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1781>said,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G863>let<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G863>go.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> the young <S%G4454>donkey<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1911>threw<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2532>it,<s%> and Jesus <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%>

<S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G4766>spread<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G3598>way,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> were cutting <S%G2875>down<s%> <S%G4746>branches<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G1186>trees,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4766>spreading<s%> them <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G3598>road.<s%>

<S%G2532>Those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> went in <S%G4254>front,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G190>followed,<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3004>out,<s%> <S%G5614>"Hosanna!<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is he <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%>

<S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> <S%G5614>Hosanna<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5310>highest!<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%G2532>When<s%> he had looked <S%G4017>around<s%> at <S%G3956>everything,<s%> it being <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G3798>evening,<s%> he <S%G5607>went<s%> <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve.<s%>
<S%G2532>The<s%> next <S%G1887>day,<s%> when <S%G846>they<s%> had <S%G1831>come<s%> out <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> he was <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

<S%G1492>Seeing<s%> a fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G3113>off<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> to see <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G686>perhaps<s%> he might <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G846>it.<s%> <S%G2532>When<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> he <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G3361>but<s%> <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2540>season<s%> for <S%G4810>figs.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2036>"May<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G2590>from<s%> <S%G4675>you<s%> <S%G3371>again!<s%>" <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> heard <S%G191>it.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to throw <S%G1544>out<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G59>bought<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2690>overthrew<s%> the <S%G5132>tables<s%> of the money <S%G2855>changers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2515>seats<s%> of those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G4453>sold<s%> the <S%G4058>doves.<s%>
<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G863>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G863>allow<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G1308>carry<s%> a <S%G1223>container<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2411>temple.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G1321>taught,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3756>"Isn't<s%> <S%G1125>it<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3450><s%> 'My <S%G3624>house<s%> will be <S%G2564>called<s%> a <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations?<s%>' <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> have <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> a <S%G4693>den<s%> of <S%G3754>robbers!<s%>"

<S%G2532>The<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G2532>it,<s%> and <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> was <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>teaching.<s%>
<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3796>evening<s%> <S%G1096>came,<s%> he <S%G1607>went<s%> out <S%G1854>of<s%> the <S%G4172>city.<s%>
<S%G2532>As<s%> they passed <S%G3899>by<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning,<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> the fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> withered <S%G3583>away<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G4491>roots.<s%>

<S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G363>remembering,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> <S%G1492>look!<s%> The fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G2672>cursed<s%> has withered <S%G3583>away.<s%>"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2192>"Have<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> most <S%G281>certainly<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3739>whoever<s%> may <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G142><s%> 'Be taken up <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%>' <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>doesn't<s%> <S%G1252>doubt<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3004>says<s%> is <S%G1096>happening;<s%> he shall <S%G2071>have<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437>he<s%> <S%G3004>says.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124>I<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> all things <S%G3745%G99999>whatever<s%> you <S%G154>pray<s%> and <S%G4336>ask<s%> <S%G4100>for,<s%> believe <S%G3754>that<s%> you have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G2532>them,<s%> and <S%G5213>you<s%> shall have <S%G2071>them.<s%>

<S%G3752>Whenever<s%> you <S%G4739>stand<s%> <S%G4336>praying,<s%> <S%G863>forgive,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G5100>anyone;<s%> so <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> who <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> may <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3900>transgressions.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G863>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G863>forgive,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G863>will<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3900>transgressions.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> was <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> they began <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1722>"By<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> do <S%G4160>you<s%> do these <S%G5023>things?<s%> <S%G2532>Or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things?<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> "I <S%G1905%G99999>will<s%> <S%G1905>ask<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3056>question.<s%> <S%G611>Answer<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G2046>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>
The <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%>— <S%G2258>was<s%> it <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G444>men?<s%> <S%G611>Answer<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3049>reasoned<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1437>"If<s%> we should <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G1537><s%> 'From <S%G3772>heaven;<s%>' he will <S%G2046>say,<s%> <S%G5101><s%> 'Why <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1223>did<s%> <S%G4100>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%>'

<S%G1437>If<s%> we should <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2036><s%> 'From <S%G444>men<s%>'" — they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G2192>held<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3754>to<s%> <S%G3689>really<s%> <S%G2258>be<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1492>"We<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1492>know.<s%>" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G611>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3761>"Neither<s%> do <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>"
